fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action
industry_forums: Zoetis follows different industry forums in the remit of its membership/partnership of the below mentioned organisations/platforms/networks.
eu_initiatives: EU Animal welfare policy; proposal for a Regulation on Veterinay medicinal products; proposal for a Regulation on the manufacture, placing on the market and use of medicated feed; EU Framework program for research & innovation; organic farming regulation; regulation on Mercury.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Zoetis is a member of:  
- AnimalhealthEurope and HealthforAnimals; 
- EFPIA Partners in research 
- One Health Platform (Partners) 
- Partner of the European Partnership for Alternative Approaches to Animal Testing 
- Zoetis occasionally participates in other activities and networks.
position: Senior Director Public Affairs International Operations
relevant_communication: Zoetis organises occasionally events and also participates to events/ activities of the below mentioned organisations/ platforms/ networks.
goals__remit: Zoetis discovers, develops, manufactures and markets veterinary vaccines and medicines, complemented by diagnostic products and genetic tests, biodevices and supported by a range of services. Zoetis serves veterinarians, livestock producers and people who raise and care for farm and companion animals.
